name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Frosting
author: Denece Frisbie
summary: This tastes exactly like cookie dough, for those of you who 'love' cookie dough! No eggs added, so safe to eat as a snack...well maybe not for your thighs. Excellent to make a little thicker and eat on a spoon or add more cream or milk and make a dip out of it!
ingredients: ¾ cup packed light brown sugar
½ cup butter, at room temperature
¼ cup heavy whipping cream, or to taste
½ cup miniature chocolate chips, or more to taste
directions: Beat brown sugar and butter together in a bowl using an electric mixer on medium speed until smooth and creamy
Beat flour, vanilla extract, and salt into creamed butter until combined
Slowly mix cream into butter mixture until desired consistency is reached; fold in chocolate chips
